author: Simon Difford
description: Basically the same as a Veneziano Spritz but with equal proportions wine to Italian red bitter liqueur, we like to further distinguish the Bicicletta from the spritz by serving it with less volume in a tall slim highball glass rather than the larger glassware associated with spritz. Much more appropriate for the ride home.
name: Bicicletta Spritz

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into an ice-filled glass
If poured in the following order there should be no need to stir
